abstract: A O Scott reviews movie Aloha, written and directed by Cameron Crowe and starring Bradley Cooper, Emma Stone and Rachel McAdams.
lead_paragraph: Cameron Crowe’s loose and leisurely film can be enjoyed the way you enjoy a catch-up beer with an old friend you don’t have much in common with anymore.

headline.main: Review: ‘Aloha,’ a Hangout Movie With Bradley Cooper and Emma Stone in Hawaii
headline.print_headline: Burying the Hatchet in Volcanic Soil

snippet: Cameron Crowe’s loose and leisurely film can be enjoyed the way you enjoy a catch-up beer with an old friend you don’t have much in common with anymore.
